Group 3 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Pack

Organization.qualification.issuer (issuer)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-referenceElement `Organization.qualification.issuer` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Organization.qualification.issuer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

name: R5OrganizationElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4 Organization
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Organization to FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Organization.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.language`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Organization.endpoint` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.endpoint`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.description` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.qualification` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.identifier` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Organization.qualification.identifier` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.code` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Organization.qualification.code` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Organization.qualification.period` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Organization.qualification.issuer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
